title: plz rito fix this bug
body: there is a bug iv seen its rely annoying as its game changing its to do with the ult cd some times it ses its on cd but its not its on cd but it has no timer on it this is game changing as you can walk into a fight and die because you had ult up but it was on cd in reality this happened to me on {{champion:122}} and {{champion:111}} so far plz fix this as there is nothing worst then 0 cd timers
